definition: presaging or likely to bring good luck
details:
adjective
- presaging or likely to bring good luck
= synonyms: favourable, lucky, prosperous, favorable
- suggestive of gold
= example: suggestive of gold
- having the deep slightly brownish color of gold
= example: having the deep slightly brownish color of gold
= synonyms: gilded
- supremely favored
= example: supremely favored
= synonyms: fortunate
- marked by peace and prosperity
= example: marked by peace and prosperity
= synonyms: prosperous, halcyon
- made from or covered with gold
= synonyms: gilded, gold
